view.explorer.name: Jest Tests
command.run.test.title: Run Test
command.run.test.description: Run current test with last known config
command.run.file.title: Run File
command.run.file.description: Run current file with last known config
command.debug.file.title: Debug File
command.debug.file.description: Debug current file with last known config
command.config.reset.title: Reset configuration for current file
configuration.jest.command.description: If left empty the extension will run the jest bin from `${workspaceFolder}/node_modules`
configuration.jest.config.description: Jest config path, relative to `${workspaceFolder}`, e.g. `jest.config.json`. If left empty the extension will scan recursively `${workspaceFolder}` based on the patterns provided
configuration.jest.config.patterns.descr: Comma-separated jest config file patterns. Please note that `jest.config.j`s and `jest.config.json` are included by default
configuration.jest.config.command.args.d: Additional CLI arguments, e.g. `--coverage`, `--silent`, etc. Please note that this setting will be passed *as is*
